name: Policy Dynamic V2 (Q4-2025)
description: Runner-driven dynamic thresholds with two-stage fallback, monthly overrides for low-trade months, and snapshotting/aggregation enabled.
notes: Policies are resolved monthly; when trades < 8 after primary sim, the runner applies first_pass fallback and re-simulates all + sectors.
If still < 8 trades, second_pass fallback applies including gate/max_open relax, and forecast_with_patterns is rebuilt before re-sim.
Each run is snapshotted under reports/forecast/<month>/history/run_<timestamp> and aggregated by scripts/34_aggregate_run_history.py.
A/B for 2025-01..09 vs baseline (16 trades / 336 PnL): post-fallback delivered 18 trades / 484.63 PnL (rows=79).
